problem_text:
Let Fn be a free group with basis {x1, . . . , xn}, and let |·| be the length function
with respect to this basis. For α ∈Aut Fn we put ||α|| = max{|α(x1)|, . . . , |α(xn)|}.
Is it true that there is a recursive function f : N →N with the following property:
for any α ∈Aut Fn there is a basis {y1, . . . , yk} of Fix(α) = {x | α(x) = x} such that
|yi| ⩽f(||α||) for all i = 1, . . . , k?
O. V. Bogopolski
